price: (قىيامەت كۈنى) سىلەرگە قىزىق ئوتنىڭ يالقۇنى ۋە تۈتۈنى ئەۋەتىلىدۇ، سىلەر ئۆزۈڭلارنى قوغدىيالمايسىلەر[35].
arabic: يُرۡسَلُ عَلَيۡكُمَا شُوَاظٞ مِّن نَّارٖ وَنُحَاسٞ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yur'salu ʿalaykumā shuwāẓun min nārin wanuḥāsun falā tantaṣirāni
translations: you will (be able to) defend yourselves
